name: Pomegranate Baby
description:
Pomegranate Baby

WASD - to move

Right click - to load the bow

Release right click - to shoot

This was my first Unity project that I made in my ICS 485 class taught by Professor Jason Leigh at the University of Hawaii.

If there are any bugs or improvements, let me know! I drew the cutscenes a bit hurriedly, so in the future I plan on tidying them up :)
